forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 51F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
